prompts: Create a unique Pokemon featuring metal components and a magnetic theme for an electric-type.
I want a design for a Pokemon that showcases three interconnected spheres with a futuristic look.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that embodies electricity and magnetism with a sleek metallic appearance.
Make a Pokemon that has a triad structure, representing teamwork and electrical energy.
Imagine a steel-type creature that has a shiny surface and is composed of three parts.
Design a Pokemon that illustrates the concept of magnetism with a cool color palette and symmetrical form.
Give me a Pokemon that appears to float and has a strong electrical presence, suitable for a battle.

distinctive_features: Light blue circular core on each sphere
